mapper.sql: a.owid AS "owid", a.bkzy_ref_owid AS "bkzyRefOwid", a.xxbh AS "xxbh", a.user_ref_owid AS "userRefOwid", a.xm AS "xm", a.xb AS "xb", a.lxdh AS "lxdh", a.jtzz AS "jtzz", a.bmnd AS "bmnd", a.mz AS "mz", a.sfzh AS "sfzh", a.yx AS "yx", a.qq AS "qq", a.tcah AS "tcah", a.xklb AS "xklb", a.wyyz AS "wyyz", a.wycj AS "wycj", a.zxlb AS "zxlb", a.jssm AS "jssm", a.jsfj AS "jsfj", a.qtqk AS "qtqk", a.xzzylj AS "xzzylj", a.xzzymc AS "xzzymc", a.bklb AS "bklb", a.sqsj AS "sqsj", a.bmb_zp AS "bmbZp", a.cnszp AS "cnszp", a.cssj AS "cssj", a.jjly AS "jjly", a.jfsj AS "jfsj", a.jfpzh AS "jfpzh", a.jfpz_zp AS "jfpzZp", a.mssj AS "mssj", a.msfzh AS "msfzh", a.msfz_znxh AS "msfzZnxh", a.msfz_sxh AS "msfzSxh", a.zkzh AS "zkzh", a.rzbd AS "rzbd", a.grzp AS "grzp", a.cqsj AS "cqsj", a.bdsj AS "bdsj", a.zkz_mb AS "zkzMb", a.bmb_mb AS "bmbMb", a.dy_sj AS "dySj", a.xybnr AS "xybnr", a.bscj AS "bscj", a.mscj AS "mscj", a.zzcj AS "zzcj", a.memo AS "memo", a.yzmc AS "yzmc", a.xklb_owid AS "xklbOwid", a.bklb_owid AS "bklbOwid", a.exp1 AS "exp1", a.exp2 AS "exp2", a.exp3 AS "exp3", a.exp4 AS "exp4", a.exp5 AS "exp5", a.exp6 AS "exp6", a.exp7 AS "exp7", a.exp8 AS "exp8", a.exp9 AS "exp9", a.exp10 AS "exp10", a.creator AS "creator", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.creator_name AS "creatorName", a.lastupdate AS "lastupdate", a.updator AS "updator", a.updator_name AS "updatorName", a.ver AS "ver", a.vertime AS "vertime", a.dept_id AS "deptId", a.dept_path AS "deptPath", a.delflg AS "delflg", a.state AS "state"
mapper.select:
SELECT b.xzzymc AS "bmzy", b.xybnr AS "xybCz", b.memo AS "memo", b.jjly AS "jjly", IFNULL(b.state,0) AS "bmState", b.owid AS "applyOwid" FROM bckj_biz_bm b
b.user_ref_owid=#{yhRefOwid} AND b.xxbh=#{xxbh} AND b.bmnd=#{bmnd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bckj_biz_bm( owid, bkzy_ref_owid, xxbh, user_ref_owid, xm, xb, lxdh, jtzz, bmnd, mz, sfzh, yx, qq, tcah, xklb, wyyz, wycj, zxlb, jssm, jsfj, qtqk, xzzylj, xzzymc, bklb, sqsj, bmb_zp, cnszp, cssj, jjly, jfsj, jfpzh, jfpz_zp, mssj, msfzh, msfz_znxh, msfz_sxh, zkzh, rzbd, grzp, cqsj, bdsj, zkz_mb, bmb_mb, dy_sj, xybnr, bscj, mscj, zzcj, memo, yzmc, xklb_owid, bklb_owid, exp1, exp2, exp3, exp4, exp5, exp6, exp7, exp8, exp9, exp10, creator, createtime, creator_name, lastupdate, updator, updator_name, ver, vertime, dept_id, dept_path, delflg, state ) VALUES ( #{owid}, #{bkzyRefOwid}, #{xxbh}, #{userRefOwid}, #{xm}, #{xb}, #{lxdh}, #{jtzz}, #{bmnd}, #{mz}, #{sfzh}, #{yx}, #{qq}, #{tcah}, #{xklb}, #{wyyz}, #{wycj}, #{zxlb}, #{jssm}, #{jsfj}, #{qtqk}, #{xzzylj}, #{xzzymc}, #{bklb}, #{sqsj}, #{bmbZp}, #{cnszp}, #{cssj}, #{jjly}, #{jfsj}, #{jfpzh}, #{jfpzZp}, #{mssj}, #{msfzh}, #{msfzZnxh}, #{msfzSxh}, #{zkzh}, #{rzbd}, #{grzp}, #{cqsj}, #{bdsj}, #{zkzMb}, #{bmbMb}, #{dySj}, #{xybnr}, #{bscj}, #{mscj}, #{zzcj}, #{memo}, #{yzmc}, #{xklbOwid}, #{bklbOwid}, #{exp1}, #{exp2}, #{exp3}, #{exp4}, #{exp5}, #{exp6}, #{exp7}, #{exp8}, #{exp9}, #{exp10}, #{creator}, #{createtime}, #{creatorName}, #{lastupdate}, #{updator}, #{updatorName}, #{ver}, #{vertime}, #{deptId}, #{deptPath}, #{delflg}, #{state} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bckj_biz_bm SET owid = #{owid}, bkzy_ref_owid = #{bkzyRefOwid}, xxbh = #{xxbh}, user_ref_owid = #{userRefOwid}, xm = #{xm}, xb = #{xb}, lxdh = #{lxdh}, jtzz = #{jtzz}, bmnd = #{bmnd}, mz = #{mz}, sfzh = #{sfzh}, yx = #{yx}, qq = #{qq}, tcah = #{tcah}, xklb = #{xklb}, wyyz = #{wyyz}, wycj = #{wycj}, zxlb = #{zxlb}, jssm = #{jssm}, jsfj = #{jsfj}, qtqk = #{qtqk}, xzzylj = #{xzzylj}, xzzymc = #{xzzymc}, bklb = #{bklb}, sqsj = #{sqsj}, bmb_zp = #{bmbZp}, cnszp = #{cnszp}, cssj = #{cssj}, jjly = #{jjly}, jfsj = #{jfsj}, jfpzh = #{jfpzh}, jfpz_zp = #{jfpzZp}, mssj = #{mssj}, msfzh = #{msfzh}, msfz_znxh = #{msfzZnxh}, msfz_sxh = #{msfzSxh}, zkzh = #{zkzh}, rzbd = #{rzbd}, grzp = #{grzp}, cqsj = #{cqsj}, bdsj = #{bdsj}, zkz_mb = #{zkzMb}, bmb_mb = #{bmbMb}, dy_sj = #{dySj}, xybnr = #{xybnr}, bscj = #{bscj}, mscj = #{mscj}, zzcj = #{zzcj}, memo = #{memo}, yzmc=#{yzmc}, xklb_owid=#{xklbOwid}, bklb_owid=#{bklbOwid}, exp1 = #{exp1}, exp2 = #{exp2}, exp3 = #{exp3}, exp4 = #{exp4}, exp5 = #{exp5}, exp6 = #{exp6}, exp7 = #{exp7}, exp8 = #{exp8}, exp9 = #{exp9}, exp10 = #{exp10}, creator = #{creator}, createtime = #{createtime}, creator_name = #{creatorName}, lastupdate = #{lastupdate}, updator = #{updator}, updator_name = #{updatorName}, ver = #{ver}, vertime = #{vertime}, dept_id = #{deptId}, dept_path = #{deptPath}, delflg = #{delflg}, state = #{state} WHERE owid = #{owid}
